reviews.text: Muy servicial ... great all around experience here
A beautiful and delicious restaurant with amazing service!!!
Amazing food, great service, and great selection. Thanks for letting us film in there!
Delicious authentic Mexican food and lovely service.

10/10, 100% of the time!!! this place is my absolute go to restaurant for mexican food; it‚Äôs one of the best, if not THE best, mexican food i‚Äôve had in ny! family owned and the service is impeccable!!! i think they know me by now because i get the same thing religiously and one time i forgot to add cheese to my order and the server was like ‚Äúcheese?‚Äù üòä speaking of, their elote is bomb n the birria torta (w cheese) is beyond decadent ü´∂üèΩ
Very fresh tasing Burrito. It's not Valencia St, but a Bushwick 5!

Birria my sweet
Bursts delightfully in mouth
Yummy yummy yum

Muchas Gracias üå∫,

Gabrielo el jefe
great food, cute spot, super nice staff!
So good

Excellent! Legit! Flavorful! Authentic! I‚Äôd been craving chilaquiles for a while and these hit. Clean space. Good food. Nice people. Can‚Äôt wait to go back to try the tacos, tortas, nachos and flautas. They know what they‚Äôre doing. Keep the consistency. üëèüëèüëèü§©ü§©ü§©

3rd visit had barbacoa tacos ü§©
Best torta ever

The food was delicious.
The portion was filling.
The price was reasonable.
The service was excellent.
The place was very clean.

Best tacos in ridgewood and the surrounding bushwick area. Vibes are solid here as well. Prices are reasonable considering other options in the area
amazing tacos and kind service!
Not only did the food look wonderful, it tasted even better! The food was so authentic, I haven‚Äôt had something like this in a while, would recommend 1000%
Go to spot for tacos. Just tried the classic torta and have found my new favorite item. Quesadilla is also huge and delicious. Def give these guys a shot!

Muy mala experiencia , tuve que salirme y cancelar mi orden , trat√© de ordenar 2 diferentes platos y era una larga espera , y pesima la actitud de la persona que te toma la orden , el agua de horchata no ten√≠a sabor , as√≠ que no volveremos m√°s üëéüëéüëé‚Ä¶

Will def be going back whenever I‚Äôm in the area. Not only was all the food we got SOO food but the customer service was amazing. It seems like a smaller family owned spot and the owner was so kind and helpful. The portions are big and everything tasted fresh and hot. If you‚Äôre craving tacos or just Mexican food, def check this place out!!
Loved this place, brought my mom for her birthday and she loved the food and the service was incredible! Totally recommend coming!

Hands down the best Mexican restaurant in queens, top 5 in NYC.

Be warned they‚Äôre closed for the rest of this week

I love this place! I‚Äôve eating there multiple times and it has never disappointed me. The quesadillas, the pozole, and the coconut flan are my favorites. Highly recommend the place for a delicious meal!
Delicious! Had the tacos and quesatacos de birria, both exceptional and appetizing ü§§ü§§
Todo est√° muy bueno lo √∫nico que es la 2da vez que no me mandan picante üòí‚Ä¶
It‚Äôs hard to find good Mexican food in NYC, this place is a gem! Amazing food, amazing attentive service and nice vibe! HIGHLY RECOMMEND
Loved my flor de calabaza!

So utterly impressed with this place. Everything was insanely tasty from the enchiladas to the birria to the coconut flan. The service was also beyond amazing - just a great restaurant experience all together.
A kind man gives you birria and agua fresca and it warms you right up

Sweet spot for a casual yet lovely meal! Nice veggie options too. The food tasted fresh and made with love and care. friendly service. The quesadilla with flor de calabaza and enchiladas Rojas were delish!
Delicious and fresh with cozy ambiance.
Excellent service and authentic cuisine. Been coming since they opened
It‚Äôs difficult finding really good Mexican food in Toronto so absolutely love coming here! Amazing food
I‚Äôve ordered a few times before but had to review today after trying the Torta Puerca - outrageously delicious, especially with the two salsas on the side.
Just fire

This is one of my go-tos whenever I'm in New York. Literally anything you order will be made with fresh ingredients, hot and the staff are so friendly. You can't go wrong with the torta de milanesa de pollo, or the enchiladas de pollo, quesadilla and definitely need to try their queso birrias. Enjoy!
Extremely good
Servicio un poco lento la comida buena y picante excelente

A friend recommended this restaurant and it did not disappoint. We loved the authentic mexican food & the service was great. Our server, Raul, was very friendly, helpful and attentive. The food was delicious. We got the birria tacos, quesadillas and guac. Loved it all. Will be back!
Hubby and I went out for our anniversary.  Everything, and the.service was great. Go and Enjoy!!!
Except for AC this was pleasant.  Food will improve I'm sure
Chicken enchiladas with salsa verde was west-coast tier, as were the rice and beans
Loved it here! My partner got the fish tacos on special (pictured below). I got a couple veggie tacos - one mushroom. They were so accommodating about me not eating dairy and unbelievably nice.

I ordered a huarache,  sadly it had been precooked, and so it made the huarache stiff and very difficult to chew.  It was so bad that at some point all I could do was eat what was on top, the (meat and cheese) Leaving the actual huarache behind.
Love all their dishes! Authentic, affordable and tasty. Great service from a family owned Ridgewood restaurant. Picture below is from a recent fish taco special that was amazing.

One of the coolest Mexicans spots in the area!!! Traditional food from El DF- I love my quesadilla de Masa con chorizo. Flautas are a great choice, tacos de pescado incredible too, tacos al pastor, the drinks I like the aguas frescas. Service is great, prices affordable, the music is on point - love when they play Luis Miguel songs.
I do recommend this extraordinary place-will make u feel that u are in Mexico city.
Thank you to all the ladies who cook for us and the staff that provides a wonderful service.
Exceptional Mexican food. Some of the best in this neighborhood. Everything is fresh and made in house, including the tortillas and cheeses. Highly recommend!
delicioso y el servicio excelente
Authentic Mexican classics in a laid back setting with kind service!

Really, really delicious wholesome tasting food. We got avocado sopes, an el pastor huarache and a chicken quesadilla. Everything was great and the portions were big enough for leftovers tomorrow. Yay! Very friendly people too.
Love going here, this is our go to spot when eating out. Food is always delicious and for a reasonable price.

Any of the tacos is great! I love their hot sauces, especially the green one. Tamarind juice is a plus and the mango sorbet dessert is a pleasant surprise. Staff is friendly and nice, family owned and run.

disclaimer: an asian living in japan who never been to mexico, so im not here to judge on authenticity, but service and taste.

came before 12 and was the only one there. Serve me with tortilla chips and home made salsa and verde sauce. quite spicy. ordered Tacos de Birria and it was amazing. They are quite a big portion and sort of messy but I would still eat there than have it take out. but I still choose to eat with my hands any day.

Tamarind juice was so good (and needed to calm my palette)
I will 100 % visit again and try more food.
The 2 men who served me was kind and lovely who tries to always attend to my needs (more tissues, wifi, etc)

Everytime im craving a quesadilla or some tacos, even pozole! this is the place to go! This is the only place my 8 year old boy will be happy to eat at. He is always asking if we can go to Las Chilangas! :) my husband tells me this place reminds him of his Mexicoüíö  they have a really good presentation and their food taste even better!
Wow! Amazing food, portions and flavors! The agua frescas are perfect! All the live plants and bright colors add to the beautiful vibes too. Loved the tiny flavored gums at the end.

3/24/22: Had the quesatacos de birria which is 3 tortillas half fried (so a bit crunchy but still a bit soft), filled with Oaxaca cheese, cilantro, onions, and birria. You also get a cup of birria consome on the side to dip into.  It was pretty good though I think I'd like it even better if the tortillas were full hard shell crunchy.

Nothing prepared me for the taste-bomb so colourful they dance on my palate. Every bite is a mouthful of spice, meat, filling, cilantro, salsa verde y rojo (I made these up .. sorry but they‚Äôre salsas to die for) .. with a squirt of the lime, chunks of cheese balances the whole power of taste. The tacos were a bit soggy as I didn‚Äôt eat it on site but brought it home, but as it got limpier, messier, I‚Äôm glad I‚Äôm home to devour such flavourful tacos without embarrassing myself in public. The consomm√© is liquid gold I can slurp this any time of the day. Spicy hot but not too chilly to numb my palette it is ‚Äònoisily slurping off the cup‚Äô good. Every spice got its own time in the taco sun. Amazing. Will be back! (Where‚Äôs my beer)
Amazing "Tacos de Birria" place has a clean atmosphere with a great host. The quality of the food was amazing. I would really recommend it. Especially for a date or a night out. Lml
We stopped in here one day because we were famished and this place did not disappoint. Friendly staff and great food. We look forward to coming back next time we‚Äôre in the area!
Excelente ambiente y bien familiar, siempre mi familia y yo vamos a cenar aca. La comida es fresca, las aguas son refrescantes y las salsas bien picosas y ricas.

The best customer service! I ordered the small taco platter which was 12 mini tacos with 6 chicken and 6 carnitas. Came very well prepared with all the fixings. The best nachos around. Even the delivery was handled with care and was very friendly.
The service and foos were great. We had bistec nachos and tacos de pescado.
Great food it may take some time but it‚Äôs worth the wait, try the quesabirria you may end up eating two, they are so good and so yummy üòã always good agua de horchata‚Ä¶

Muy recomendado este lugar, muy sabrosa la comida... en lo personal muy exquisito todo... invito a toda la gente a venir a comer. El mesero que me atendi√≥ s√∫per atento y muy servicial. No tengo m√°s estrellas si no  le dar√≠a 10....
Nice Mexican place, the restaurant is super clean and with good service. Go try!

This place is insanely good! The staff is so friendly and whenever I order delivery, the food is always packaged nicely and still hot. I love the pambazos and the birria tacos and quesadilla from here. 10/10 for me!
I have probably eaten at least 20 different Mexican places when I used to hang in Bushwick, but no Torta comes close. Randomly wandered in here and ‚Ä¶..just wow.

Embarrassed to admit how long it took me to discover this gem in the neighborhood... I'll be making regular visits for their carnitas quesadilla now. The morroz is too big for one person but I'm not complaining!
First time I'm order from this place soon I opened my food delivery I can tell the Amazing and professional is the packaging.  The food is delicious üòã  full recommend!

The food is really good and the people that work there is very friendly, the place is cozy, my girlfriend and I we have a good time here.
I‚Äôll recommend this place to try all the garnachas from us DF.
